suite.name: 02 Customer Management

kw.name: Get Time
kw.doc: Returns the given time in the requested format.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

test.name: 1006 Should be able to add new customer

kw.name: Setup for Customer Tests
Open Browser To Home Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: Welcome to the customer relationship manager site!
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Ouvre le navigateur et navigue à la page d'accueil.

Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
